page.title: 14SCHOOL DAY - PART TWO
page.content: At 12.10 I meet my friend Tracy and we go to dinner together. When we have finished we meet all our other friends outside and talk until the bell goes at 1.15. In the afternoon we have more lessons of French and Geography. At 4 pm we go home. I walk home with Tracy and arrive at my house at about 4.35. If I have any homework I do that, and then listen to records in my room. I have tea at about 6 o'clock. At about 6.15 pm I somtimes get ready to go to the Campus Disco. I meet my friends there. The disco is from 7.00 pm to 10.00 pm. When the disco has finished my dad picks me and my brother up from the Campus. We go home and I have something to eat and drink and get into bed eventually at about 10.40 pm.
